1.0.name: wordpress/moot
1.0.description:
The Moot plugin provides a shortcode to support Moot forums. Use either [moot-forum] or [moot-forums]; they do exactly the same thing.

NOTE: This plugin does not currently work on a Windows Server. If you have a business need for it to run on Windows Server please feel free to contact us about it.
